floater.name: toolbox floater
floater.text: Drag to move, shift-drag to copy

panel.label: General
panel.name: General

check_box.label: Share with group
check_box.name: checkbox share with group
check_box.tool_tip: Allow all members of the set group to share and use your permissions for this object. You must Deed to enable role restrictions.

button.label: Deed...
button.name: button deed
button.tool_tip: Group shared objects can be deeded by a group officer.

check_box.label: Show in search
check_box.name: search_check
check_box.tool_tip: Let people see this object in search results

button.label: Copy Key
button.name: button cpy_key
button.tool_tip: Copies the object key to the clipboard.

panel.string: You can't modify this object across a region boundary
You can't modify these objects across a region boundary
Must select entire object to set permissions.

check_box.label: Locked
check_box.name: checkbox locked
check_box.tool_tip: Prevents object from being moved or deleted. Frequently useful during building to avoid unintended edits.

check_box.label: Physical
check_box.name: Physical Checkbox Ctrl
check_box.tool_tip: Allows object to be pushed and affected by gravity

check_box.label: Temporary
check_box.name: Temporary Checkbox Ctrl
check_box.tool_tip: Causes object to be deleted 1 minute after creation.

check_box.label: Phantom
check_box.name: Phantom Checkbox Ctrl
check_box.tool_tip: Causes object to not collide with other objects or avatars

check_box.label: Mirror
check_box.name: sculpt mirror control
check_box.tool_tip: Flips sculpted prim along the X axis.

check_box.label: Inside-out
check_box.name: sculpt invert control
check_box.tool_tip: Inverts the sculpted prims normals, making it appear inside-out.

panel.label: Features
panel.name: Features
panel.text: Select only one primitive to edit features.

check_box.label: Animated Mesh
check_box.name: Animated Mesh Checkbox Ctrl
check_box.tool_tip: Allows rigged mesh objects to be animated independently

check_box.label: Flexible Path
check_box.name: Flexible1D Checkbox Ctrl
check_box.tool_tip: Allows object to flex about the Z axis. (Client-side only)

texture_picker.name: light texture control
texture_picker.tool_tip: Click to choose a projection image (only has effect with deferred rendering enabled)

check_box.tool_tip: Colour parcels according to their ownership
check_box.label: Show owners
check_box.name: checkbox show owners

floater.string: Drag colored bands to rotate object
Click and drag to stretch selected side
Drag to move, shift-drag to copy
Click an arrow to align objects in that direction
Click and hold to modify land
Click and drag to change view
Drag to move, Ctrl to lift, Ctrl-Shift to rotate
Click and drag to select land
